text.div: • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationValue where concept is-a _ActFinancialStatusObservationValue

name: ActFinancialStatusObservationValue
title: ActFinancialStatusObservationValue
description: Code specifying financial indicators used to assess or establish eligibility for coverage under a policy or program; e.g., pay stub; tax or income document; asset document; living expenses.
